basisSet.dc:title: aug-pV7Z
basisSet.dct:abstract: V7Z6P Valence Septuple Zeta + Polarization on All Atoms
basisSet.dc:description:
Augmented Polarized Valence Septuple Zeta (pV7Z-like) Basis ----------------------------------------------------------- H: (15s,7p,6d,5f,4g,3h,2i) -> [8s,7p,6d,5f,4g,3h,2i] C - F: (19s,13p,7d,6f,5g,4h,3i,2k) -> [9s,8p,7d,6f,5g,4h,3i,2k] D. Feller and K.A. Peterson, J. Chem. Phys. 110, 8384 (1999) Ne: (19s,13p,7d,6f,5g,4h,3i,2k) -> [9s,8p,7d,6f,5g,4h,3i,2k] D. Feller (to be published) S: (28s,19p,7d,6f,5g,4h,3i,2k) ->[10s,9p,7d,6f,5g,4h,3i,2k] D. Feller and J.A. Sordo J. Chem. Phys. 113, 485 (2000). The k function exponents were provided by Dr. Ed. Valeev from the Georgia Institute of Technology.
